text:
Canva | Sydney, Australia | Visa | Relocation paid Canva is revolutionising design with 20,000 new users everyday. https://about.canva.com/careers/ https://about.canva.com/careers/front-end-engineer/

Looking for Frontend Engineers: - Javascript expert - Strong academic background - Excellent grasp of software engineering fundamentals - Excellent English communication skills, written and spoken

Position is fulltime in Sydney. Come be part of Australia's next Unicorn. email resumes to jobs@canva.com. Please state that you saw the add on Hacker News.
